__e: Kelso, when a woman talks, you have to look her in the eyes and pretend her words are like oxygen and without them, you can't breathe.
We have him on an artificial respirator. That's why he seems to be breathing. But his brain is dead.
We did everything we could for her, and we we gave her medicine and oxygen and blood.
Will someone get some air to his brain?
